Name: Tomb Raider III
About the game: Thousands of years ago a meteor crashed into Antarctica and the shockwaves of its impact are being felt in the modern age. Lara Croft will follow clues leading to a deadly secret, boldly leaping chasms and blasting monsters that no one has leaped or blasted before. This time she faces a mystery that's from way out of this world. Tomb Raider III is a complex adventure that combines puzzles with high-speed action.
Meta Title: Tomb Raider III: Nov 28, 2012, Core Design and Full Overview
Meta Description: Looking for information on Tomb Raider III? Check out the release date (Nov 28, 2012), developer insights from Core Design, and a complete game summary.
